撕咬.definition: to tear at (with the teeth, like one animal attacking another)

撕掉.definition: to tear out (and throw away); to rip away

撕毀.definition: to tear up; to rip up; too shred

撕爛.definition: to tear up; to tear to pieces

撕破臉.definition: to have an acrimonious falling-out; to shed all pretense of cordiality; to tear into each other

撕破臉皮.definition: see 撕破臉|撕破脸[si1 po4 lian3]

撕票.definition: lit. to tear the ticket; to kill a hostage (usually held for ransom)

撕逼.definition: (slang) (lit.) to tear cunt; (fig.) (of females) to have a catfight; to have a bitch fight
